name: Pico8 TicTacToe
description:
Yet another TicTacToe Pico-8 game.

I made this as a learning exercise, to familiarize myself with Pico-8. The game is fully playable using a single controller. I went a bit overboard with the backgrounds mostly to play with Pico-8 capabilities and test its limits.

Enjoy and thanks for tryingit out. :)
